channel.title: Apache Camel on Codes are a puzzle
channel.description: Recent content in Apache Camel on Codes are a puzzle

item.title: Practical Guide to Apache Camel with Quarkus: Building an ETL Application
item.description: I am excited to introduce a series of articles about Apache Camel. In this first post, rather than delving deeply into the complexities of Apache Camel, I will present a practical use case to showcase its capabilities. Specifically, you’ll learn how to create a simple Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) application between two databases using Apache Camel. Introduction to Apache Camel - Brief Overview Before we dive into the practical use case, let’s briefly introduce Apache Camel.
